notes.text: Late season KoG, but a KoG is a KoG. Reached KoG for the first time last month with Sylvans and happy to run it back with Sylvans this month. KoG rank up was against restart DM who was too slow to keep up with Sylvans. Inspired by some of the top KC Cup decks, I tried this build to not worry about restarting. Grit worked for me as many times as grit had failed me. Fragrance is a nice tech, but easily the weakest card in my deck and could probably be replaced by an UP.
